titleStmt.title: SII 13.242: original edition by G.V. Srinivasa Rao
No. 242. (A.R. No. 623 of 1905.) TIRUCHCHEṄGŌḌU, TIRUCHENGODU TALUK, SALEM DISTRICT. ON THE ROCK TO THE WEST OF THE BOULDER CALLED NĀGARGUṆḌU ON THE WAY TO THE ARDHANĀRĪŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This records a gift of 15 kaḻañju of gold by the Kāśeṭṭāṅgal (See No. 211), for burning a lamp in the temple of Tiruchchaṅgōṭṭu-Āḷvār by Muri-Amudaṉār, the wife of Iḷaṅgōṉaḍigaḷ. The gift was left in charge of the Paṉṉiraṇḍunāṭṭu-perumakkaḷ (assembly). This donatrix may be identical with (if not a co-wife of) Kāmakkaṉār mentioned in No. 232 above and in No. 244.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . kovirācakecaripaṉmarkku tiruveḻuttiṭṭuc cellāni
ṉṟa yāṇṭu patiṉālāvatu Ivvāṇṭu tiruccaṅkoṭṭu paṉṉiraṇ
ṭunāṭṭup perumakkaḷ kaiyi(li)l Iḷaṅkoṉaṭikaḷ teviyār mu
ri Amutaṉār tiruccaṅkoṭṭuāḷvārkku Oru noṉtāviḷakkeri
ppatāka vaitta cempoṉ kāceṭṭāṅkallāl patiṉaiṅkaḻañcu Ippo
ṉṉiṉ palicai koṇṭu candrātittaval nontāviḷakkerippatāka Eṉṟom pe
rumakkaḷom muri Amutiṉukku .
Digital edition of SII 13.242 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
